member.name: IRegTreeItem.GetCheckState
member.summary: Gets the state of a check box item in a tree-view control.

param.name: pbCheck
param.para: A pointer to a BOOL that contains the state of the check box.
The check box is not checked.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IRegTreeItem.SetCheckState
member.summary: Sets the state of a check box item in a tree-view control.

param.name: bCheck
param.para: A BOOL that sets the state of the check box.
The check box is not checked.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
